categories: Category:Star Wars: Return of the Jedi

nodes.text: Return of the Jedi 2 is the second issue of the Legends comic book miniseries Star Wars: Return of the Jedi, which adapts the film of the same name. Based on a screenplay by Lawrence Kasdan and George Lucas, it was adapted by Archie Goodwin, illustrated by Al Williamson and Carlos Garzón, and first published by Marvel Comics on November 1, 1983. The issue features the story "The Emperor Commands," which opens with the Battle of the Great Pit of Carkoon.
Luke Skywalker returns to Dagobah while Emperor Palpatine plots to bring him to the dark side of the Force.
